desc: Hi,I currently have a set of 45 high-resolution aerial images that I would like to turn into a 3D model. These were acquired at a range of angles at a resolution of approximately 6 to 9 cm in a single straight overhead flight over a building, which is the main target I would like recreated.As part of the 3D reconstruction, however, these images must first be resampled (made more coarse) to approximately 1m (see attached example of 1m resolution image) before further processing is carried out. A point cloud model should then be generated from the set of images, before a subsequent mesh (eg. TIN model) is overlayed.As one side of this building is lacking in image coverage due to the flight path, the challenge then would be to create a construct a  clean, good-looking model on all 4 sides of the building - aesthetic appearance is important in this project.Open to ideas but am hoping to get this project completed as soon as possible.Many thanks!Best regards,XuI will also require a video fly-through of the final product.If preferred, I can provide the resampled image set but would prefer the pixel resampling to be done by the awardee.
title: Image Resampling & 3D Model Generation from Aerial Imagery

desc: I need an animated commercial with 3 custom characters developed.STORY: Blonde haired middle aged guy with a gut and small shoulders looking weak, holding a hose and watering his garden. Two women walk by with a dog and he notices them, tries to get their attention while holding his limp garden hose barely spewing any water onto his dying plants, they giggle to each other, laugh, walk by, and ignore him. He gets sad and goes inside and you hear typing on the computer keys. He's now looking up the website for a medical testosterone treatment and finds the clients site (WILL DISCLOSE IN PRIVATE MESSAGE). The following week he's outside again watering his lawn but looking much more confident, his gut it gone, and his shoulder are broader. The same women characters walk by, his garden hose is no longer limp and is shooting out a consistent flow of water to his plants that look much better. The women who are chatting and stop dead in their tracks and wave to him with a big smile on both their faces, he smiles back but now has a twinkle in his eye and a glimmer in his teeth similar to the orbit commercials and as they walk away he gives a thumbs up and the company name drops in from the top in some sort of banner.
title: Gardening Nerd Commercial

desc: Partner Marketing Consultant - IndonesiaAbout ZINFIZINFI Technologies, Inc., is leading the definition and creation of Unified Channel Management solutions (software and services) for organizations selling through the channel. ZINFI has multiple offices around the world and offers a unique work experience at a remarkably fast-growing technology company. This is a special opportunity for someone to come into an exciting business and grow their career with ZINFI. Please visit our site at www.zinfi.com.What you will be doing:In this marketing role, you will work with our Fortune 1000 global clients and their channel partners in these following areasOverall DescriptionIn this marketing role, you will work with our Fortune 1000 (technology, manufacturing and telecommunication) clients and their channel partnersMarketing Strategy DevelopmentYou will learn how our clients want to market their products and services via their channel partnersYou will promote our marketing automation platform that incorporates our client’s marketing assets and campaignsChannel Partner OnboardingYou will reach out to our client’s partners and set up onboarding meetings and in these meetings you will provide information on the marketing solution that the client is currently promotingUsing Skype/WebEx conferencing tools you and/or phone presentation about marketing solutions and assets followed by an explanatory emailOffer guidance to client’s partners to choose the most suitable marketing campaign based on their profile and expectationsMarketing Campaign ExecutionWork with the telemarketing agency for campaign follow ups; and maintaining the relationship between Client Partner’s, Partner Marketing Consultant and telemarketing agencyWorking with all the other marketing agencies agreed by client to run specific campaigns for client’s PartnersClient ReportingProvide daily and weekly activity reportsIdentify, document, and inform the Supervisor/Manager regarding the trends in activityAcquire and evaluate all related data to manage partner feedback and inquiriesYour Daily TargetsCall out to a minimum of 60-80 partners on a daily basisContact and speak to a minimum of 10-15 partners on a daily basisDeliver 3 presentations daily to partnersUpdate dashboards dailyAbout Your Experience:Business to Customer and Business to Business marketing experience3-5 years of telemarketing , telesales, digital marketing knowledge and experience requiredCollege degree requiredAbout Your SkillsExcellent verbal and communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia and EnglishTime and project management skillsKnowledge of advanced Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and OutlookHighly organized and strongly self-motivated with the ability to multi-task activitiesQuick learner with a positive attitude and strong problem resolution and creative thinking skills
